Text: From The Desk of Bob Virgo Cc In the event that engineering support is required for a possible sale I will be able to be reached at Florida Houston I have a complete home telephone list of all engineers in my department Bob Virgo Office

From The Desk Of Bob Virgopst Louise I anticipate Lydecker will ask for my services to assist him in the upcoming attempt to sell NEPCO Please make me unavailable for this duty It will be too time consuming for me to get involved with Thanks Bob Virgo

pst Today Im compiling next years budget with Mike Coleman and Wayne Mays We will run these budgets by Chris Calger and Dave Duran We think that we can support all of EWS using less dollars than last years budget We may elect to do everything in house In any event this is just your information no reply necessary Bob Virgo

Re PPAs and Misc MEETING THIS MORNINGroom EB B has been reserved for this meeting If you have any problems or questions please feel free to call me at Thank you Lorie Leigh Enron North America Corp From Ben F Jacoby PM Sent by Ben Jacoby To Herman nronXGate cc Kay nron Fred CT David nronXGate Ron CT Lorie CT Subject PPAs and Misc Herman Subject to your availability wed like to meet with you to discuss the following Tolling arrangements on Ft Pierce Midway and Wisconsin Midway documents and dealbench access GE letter regarding the Northwestern deal indicating their willingness to execute the acknowledgement and consent Please let me know if youre available at AM tomorrow morning Lorie Leigh will advise the group of our conference room arrangements Regards Ben

Friday Meeting re Blue Dogdate Friday May th the place EB C the time AM AM CST If you have any problems or questions please feel free to call me at Thank you Lorie Leigh Enron North America Corp From Ben F Jacoby AM Sent by Ben Jacoby To Herman nronXGate cc Kay nron Chris nron Lorie CT Subject Friday Meeting re Blue Dog Herman Kay Chris and I can meet with you on Friday at AM Lorie Please get us a conference room and advise everyone of the room number Thanks Ben

FPL construction letter agreement Midway Phase asent a print out of this letter on letterhead for you initial so that Ben could sign it Did you receive it yet Im catching up on this because I need to Fedex it out Lorie Leigh East Power Generation Development

RE Conference Call to discuss Midway LOIPlus will be hosting this call The Date Thursday June th Dialin Number Host Code Participant Code The Time PM central PM eastern If you have any problems or questions please feel free to call me Lorie Leigh East Power Generation Development Original Message From Becky Alex ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESBeckyAlexCrtalextecoenergyEcomEENRO NRONcom Sent Thursday June AM To Jacoby Ben Subject RE Conference Call to discuss Midway LOI Yes we will be in one conference room but if ENA will be calling in from several locations it would probably make sense Thanks Becky PM Becky We will plan to be available Would you like us to arrange for a call in number the Enron folks participating will be in several locations Please let me know Thanks Ben Original Message From Becky Alex ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESBeckyAlexCrtalextecoenergyEcomEENRO NRONcom Sent Tuesday June PM To Jacoby Ben Mitro Fred Eric Bronner TPSExecConf Subject Conference Call to discuss Midway LOI Item Type Appointment Start Date pm EDT Thursday Duration Hour Mins Place TPS Executive Conference Room Conference in Enron PM EDT

RE Morris LetterI have a copy of the lease to give to you How long are you going to be in your office Lorie Albrecht Senior Admin Asst Enron East Power Generation Development Office Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Thursday December PM To Zisman Stuart Leigh Lorie Tapscott Ron Jacoby Ben Schneider Chip Subject RE Morris Letter It would be helpful to see the lease and the letter before commenting Thanks Kay Original Message From Zisman Stuart Sent Thursday December PM To Leigh Lorie Tapscott Ron Jacoby Ben Mann Kay Schneider Chip Subject RE Morris Letter Please provide me with any comments to the letter I can work with Lorie to get it revised and send it out once we receive a consensus Original Message From Leigh Lorie Sent Thursday December PM To Tapscott Ron Jacoby Ben Mann Kay Zisman Stuart Schneider Chip Subject Morris Letter File morrisltrpdf Lorie Albrecht Senior Admin Asst Enron East Power Generation Development Office

RE Morris LetterIs this letter approved to go out today Please advise Lorie Albrecht Senior Admin Asst Enron East Power Generation Development Office Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Thursday December PM To Leigh Lorie Subject RE Morris Letter Probably until Original Message From Leigh Lorie Sent Thursday December PM To Mann Kay Zisman Stuart Tapscott Ron Jacoby Ben Schneider Chip Subject RE Morris Letter I have a copy of the lease to give to you How long are you going to be in your office Lorie Albrecht Senior Admin Asst Enron East Power Generation Development Office Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Thursday December PM To Zisman Stuart Leigh Lorie Tapscott Ron Jacoby Ben Schneider Chip Subject RE Morris Letter It would be helpful to see the lease and the letter before commenting Thanks Kay Original Message From Zisman Stuart Sent Thursday December PM To Leigh Lorie Tapscott Ron Jacoby Ben Mann Kay Schneider Chip Subject RE Morris Letter Please provide me with any comments to the letter I can work with Lorie to get it revised and send it out once we receive a consensus Original Message From Leigh Lorie Sent Thursday December PM To Tapscott Ron Jacoby Ben Mann Kay Zisman Stuart Schneider Chip Subject Morris Letter File morrisltrpdf Lorie Albrecht Senior Admin Asst Enron East Power Generation Development Office

Friday Meeting re Blue Dogdate Friday May th the place EB C the time AM AM CST If you have any problems or questions please feel free to call me at Thank you Lorie Leigh Enron North America Corp From Ben F Jacoby AM Sent by Ben Jacoby To Herman nronXGate cc Kay nron Chris nron Lorie CT Subject Friday Meeting re Blue Dog Herman Kay Chris and I can meet with you on Friday at AM Lorie Please get us a conference room and advise everyone of the room number Thanks Ben

Revised Due Diligence IndicesForwarded by Lorie LeighHOUECT on PM Roger Rippy on PM To cc HAL HALTOM Subject Revised Due Diligence Indices Stuart Attached are a clean and a blackline version of each of the due diligence indices for the six plants As you know I have recently made several additions to each of these indices based upon my time in the data room this past week This includes recent documents for the peakers as well as other previously unseen documents that came from the boxes that were given to me by Don Miller I understand that Jinsung and Ben Rogers had previously given the prior drafts to Ben Jacoby and others to review for redacting purposes It will be necessary and useful to give these blacklines to those persons doing that review to note the recent additions and review these as well I also understand from Carolyn Gilley that she will coordinate with Lorie Leigh regarding the creation of the due diligence files on Live Link It seems relevant that Jinsung and Ben Rogers are also aware of how this process would work My understanding and I will confirm that this is done is that Carolyns scanning personnel are to be scanning in the additions into Live Link today per my request There is also some filing and refiling that will need to be done in the data room and I have alerted Lorie Leigh to this fact via voice mail on Friday I seem to have left Don Millers as well as Ben Rogers and Jinsungs email addresses at my home over the weekend By copy of this email I am asking Lorie to please forward it to Don Ben and Jinsung She has confirmed to me via telephone that she will do so If you or any of the others involved in this project have any further question please do not hesitate to call me Thank you Best regards Roger A Rippy Andrews Kurth LLP Travis Street Suite Houston TX Direct Phone Direct Fax Email Date Mon Aug From MARTHA PETERSON To Roger Rippy Subject Attached Files MimeVersion ContentType multipartmixed boundaryECADCCA Blackline and clean of each WiltonPrDOC WiltonblDOC NewAlbanDOC NewAlbanDOC CaledoniDOC CaledoniDOC BrownsviDOC BrownsviDOC WheatlanDOC WheatlanDOC GleasonPDOC GleasonbDOC
